code: import{useState}from'react';import LoginForm from'../../components/auth/login-form/login-form';import RegisterForm from'../../components/auth/register-form/register-form';import ForgotPasswordForm from'../../components/auth/forgot-password-form/forgot-password-form';import{jsx as _jsx,Fragment as _Fragment,jsxs as _jsxs}from"react/jsx-runtime";export default function AuthPage(){const[showLoginForm,setShowLoginForm]=useState(true);const[showForgotPassword,setShowForgotPassword]=useState(false);function handleBackToLogin(){setShowLoginForm(true);setShowForgotPassword(false);}return/*#__PURE__*/_jsxs(_Fragment,{children:[/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("img",{src:"/books-logo.svg",alt:"logo",className:"books-logo"}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("h1",{children:"Biblioteca online"}),showForgotPassword?/*#__PURE__*/_jsx(ForgotPasswordForm,{handleBackToLogin:handleBackToLogin}):showLoginForm?/*#__PURE__*/_jsx(LoginForm,{setShowForgotPassword:setShowForgotPassword,setShowLoginForm:setShowLoginForm}):/*#__PURE__*/_jsx(RegisterForm,{setShowLoginForm:setShowLoginForm})]});}
